com.guidewire.pl.plugin.document

Interface IDocumentTemplateSerializer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPlugin
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface IDocumentTemplateSerializer
extends IPlugin
    Serializes and deserializes document template descriptors. Typically, descriptors persist as XML, as such implementations of this class understand the format of document template descriptors and can read and write them as XML.

        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor read(java.io.InputStream inputStream)

      • write

        void write(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
         IDocumentTemplateDescriptor descriptor)
        Deprecated. 
        Serialize the indicated template descriptor to the Writer.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - The outputstream to which the serialized descriptor should be written
        descriptor - The template descriptor to be serialized.
